name: Bird
description: Base lies on back with feet up, supporting flyer's hips. Flyer balances horizontally face-down.

name: Throne
description: Base sits with feet on flyer's hips. Flyer stands upright on base's feet.

name: Front Plank
description: Base lies on back with feet on flyer's shoulders/chest. Flyer holds plank position.

name: Shoulder Stand
description: Base lies on back supporting flyer's shoulders with feet. Flyer is vertical, head down.

name: Star
description: Base lies on back with one foot on flyer's hip, one on shoulder. Flyer spreads arms and legs like a star.

name: Folded Leaf
description: Base's feet on flyer's hips. Flyer folds forward, hands near base's head.

name: Whale (Left)
description: Single-leg base pose. Base's left foot on flyer's left hip, flyer arches sideways.

name: Whale (Right)
description: Single-leg base pose. Base's right foot on flyer's right hip, flyer arches sideways.
